name: Dungeon Escape (itch) (Suhri)
description:
You are an adventurer who found a Dungeon. The Dungeon is very dark and you can here creppy sounds but you still want all the treasures to be rich so you go inside of it and try to get them all.

Try not to get caught by the Monster(s) and dont get lost and you will come out alive.

Controlls:

WASD - Walk ; E - Interact ; LShift - Run ; Ctrl - Sneak ; Left Mouse Button - Throw Torch ; Right Mouse Button - Pick up/Switch Torch

If you have any Ideas for this game or another or for a completly different one email me (suhriyt@gmail.com) or contact me on Instagram @Suhriiii
